machineStatus Class Reference

This class contains the machine's state for one canonical command. The information stored includes the coolant state, spindle speed and direction, feedrate, start and end pose, tool in use. More...

#include <machineStatus.hh>

Inherits canon.

static millTool * theTool = 0

Detailed Description

This class contains the machine's state for one canonical command. The information stored includes the coolant state, spindle speed and direction, feedrate, start and end pose, tool in use.

machineStatus::machineStatus ( gp_Ax1  initial  ) 

This constructor is only to be used when initializing the simulation; it would not be useful elsewhere.

Parameters:
initial is the initial pose of the machine, as determined by the interp from the variable file.
See also:
machineStatus(machineStatus const& oldStatus)
